com.raystech.proj0.ctl

Class LoginCtl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raystech.proj0.ctl.BaseCtl
      • com.raystech.proj0.ctl.LoginCtl

  • @Controller
public class LoginCtl
extends BaseCtl
    Contains navigation logics for Login, Forgot Password and SignUp Usecases.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Singleton
